questions.question: Considering the overall form and structure, what is the dominant shape of this furniture piece?
What is the primary color, as visually perceived across the majority of the upholstery?
Based on its visual appearance, what seems to be the primary material used for the upholstery?
Observing the image closely, what seems to be the construction style of the seat cushions?
Focusing on the legs, what color best describes them based on their visual presentation?
Considering the overall design, what style does this piece of furniture seem to best exemplify?
Examining the armrests, what is their visual relationship to the overall seating surface?
Focusing on the cushions, describe the apparent level of firmness or softness using a single word.
What material appears to be used for the legs of the sectional?
What is the visible texture of the upholstery fabric?
Based solely on the visible construction, how many distinct seating sections does it have?
Describing the overall dimensions, is it primarily a large or small sofa?
Regarding the back cushions, are they detachable or fixed to the frame?
What kind of a design element is visible along the outer edges of the seat cushions?
Considering the style of the piece, what would you characterize the design as?
